titles.title: Land and Water Conservation Fund Act Amendments of 1987
A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, Agriculture Department, OMB.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-68.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 163.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Land and Water Conservation Fund Act Amendments of 1987 - Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to extend the authorization of appropriations through FY 2015.
